hero.subtitle: A UI/UX designer who enjoys turning messy ideas into clear, thoughtful, and meaningful digital experiences. Currently designing products at Arca Payments and leading design at Datafrik.

resume.title: Resume
resume.summary: I studied Computer Science, where logic meets creativity and empathy does the heavy lifting. I specialize in fintech, education, and travel products.

projects.title: Datafrik
projects.overview: Shaping learning experiences and designing responsive landing pages to bridge the gap in data education.

projects.title: AV Card
projects.overview: A user-centric dashboard designed for managing virtual cards and financial transactions with clarity.

projects.title: Airxplora
projects.overview: Simplifying complex travel workflows to help users feel confident while exploring and booking.

projects.title: Arcabill
projects.overview: An admin dashboard and billing system designed to simplify complex payment workflows at Arca Payments.
